name: websocket-text-relay-vscode
description: Websocket Text Relay extension for vscode

websocketTextRelay.enabled.description: Uncheck to disable sending any text updates.

websocketTextRelay.allowedHosts.description: List of allowed hosts that can connect to the websocket server. Defaults to empty array, which will allow localhost only.

websocketTextRelay.allowNetworkAccess.description: Allow other computers on your local network to be able to connect to the websocket server. Defaults to false.

websocketTextRelay.developer.serverComma.description: Used for extension development and debugging only. Override command to launch language server. Leave blank to use default server installed by package.
List of command args to use when overriding the server command. If serverCommand is blank, changing this property has no effect.

author: Niels Nielsen
